name: DeDust DEX
description: Swap tokens, browse pools, and trade on DeDust -- TON's #2 DEX

tools.name: dedust_assets
tools.description: Search or list tokens available on DeDust by symbol, name, or address

tools.name: dedust_pools
tools.description: List top DeDust liquidity pools sorted by reserves, volume, or fees

tools.name: dedust_pool_trades
tools.description: Get recent trades for a specific DeDust pool

tools.name: dedust_pool_info
tools.description: Get detailed info for a specific DeDust pool

tools.name: dedust_jetton_info
tools.description: Get jetton metadata, top holders, and top traders from DeDust

tools.name: dedust_prices
tools.description: Get prices and liquidity data for tokens from DeDust

tools.name: dedust_swap_estimate
tools.description: Estimate swap output on DeDust using on-chain pool get-methods

tools.name: dedust_swap
tools.description: Execute a swap on DeDust from the agent wallet
